pageContext.claim: “The U.S. has an increased economic value of more than 7 Trillion Dollars since the Election. May be the best economy in the history of our country. Record Jobs numbers. Nice!”
pageContext.analysis: This appears to be based on the performance of the Russell 3000 Index since Trump's inauguration. This index includes nearly 98 percent of U.S. stocks, but the market capitalization of the top U.S. companies is not necessarily an indicator of wealth gains for the general population.
